name: KILL EM POP ISLAND: Zoo Bubble Pet Shooter - from Panda Tap Games
name_original: KILL EM POP ISLAND: Zoo Bubble Pet Shooter - from Panda Tap Games
description:
Experience the excitement of the greatest match 3 puzzle game with a flavor of cute and cuddly candy pets! Use the little pet shooter to match three candy pet bubbles to unlock several items like power ups and coins. Use the coins to gain and increase your pet’s superpowers. Unlock and own different candy pets and blitz the world leaderboard ranks.

Game Features:
• A number of spectacular levels for those who love challenges: reaching target scores, clearing all obstacles, and bringing down different power ups.
• Most relaxing and addictive game play.
• Amazing fun boosters to power up for harder levels.
• Unlock all the candy pets with different powers.
• Totally FREE strategy and matching game with FREE updates, including new challenges and levels.
• One of the best FREE brain teaser games one can find!
• Super easy and fun to play, but hard to master!
• Use the coins you’ve earned to purchase special bomb bubbles. Select a bomb by clicking on the icon on the left side of the screen, then blast away big chunks of bubbles with one shot!
